snippet: The deal appears to be less a sale of its non-news publications and more the creation of a new joint venture housing substantially all of their magazines.
abstract: The deal appears to be less a sale of its non-news publications and more the creation of a new joint venture housing substantially all of their magazines.

byline.original: By ANDREW ROSS SORKIN and MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: How a Meredith-Time Warner Joint Venture Would Work
